law.text:
As used in KRS 260.016 to 260.019:
"Agricultural product" means any farm product grown, raised, or produced as a result of being in the business of "agriculture," as defined by KRS 246.010; and
"Kentucky-grown agricultural product" means any agricultural product grown, raised, produced, processed, or manufactured in Kentucky.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008.
